messages.user_message: What can I substitute for eggs?
messages.ai_response:
**Egg Substitutes for Different Purposes:**

1. **Baking Cakes or Muffins:**
   • 1/4 cup unsweetened applesauce or mashed banana per egg
   • 1/4 cup silken tofu blended until smooth per egg

2. **Binding in Meatballs or Burgers:**
   • 1 tablespoon ground flaxseed mixed with 3 tablespoons water per egg
   • 1/4 cup breadcrumbs mixed with 3 tablespoons water per egg

3. **Fluffiness in Pancakes:**
   • 1/4 cup yogurt or buttermilk per egg
   • 1/4 cup carbonated water or soda water per egg
